name: AdCapacity.com
description: Connecting Ad Buyers with Ad Sellers
overview:
AdCapacity.com is a hassle free and unbiased service that helps small-medium size business (SMBs) acquire more customers.

By completing a simple form, SMBs will be provided with a report detailing the opportunities that exist in digital, social, traditional, and emerging media along with the best practices they can take advantage of to reach and acquire more customers.

From here, SMBs can choose to do-it themselves or have AdCapacity.com connect them to proven professionals who can do the job on their behalf.

If a company is selling products, offering a service, or trying to create awareness, our goal is to be their go-to resource for getting the most bang for their marketing & advertising buck.

AdCapacity.com, in public beta.
